main.name: Elijah Soladoye
main.occupation: Fullstack Django | ReactJS Developer && UE4 Game Development Enthusiast
main.description: Always learning how to build positively impacting, optimized and immersive stuff. #Mikaelson
main.bio: Hello, my name is Elijah Soladoye, and I'm a full-stack developer with over four years of expertise who knows how to build applications with Django, Postgres, and React, among other technologies. I appreciate resolving issues, increasing customer satisfaction, and working with other developers to add value, and I'm always willing to learn more. Over the years, I've worked as a backend developer, a frontend developer, and a full-stack developer for a variety of organisations and clients. To promote optimal collaboration among developers, I believe that effective communication, discipline, work-life balance, and honesty should be maintained when working with individuals. I also feel that as a team player, one must be willing to make sacrifices in order to help the team when necessary.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build amazing and impacting stuff, I mean, who doesn't love a good challenge right?, so don't hold back.

testimonials.text: In some ways, programming is like painting. You start with a blank canvas and certain basic raw materials. You use a combination of science, art, and craft to determine what to do with them.
Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in.
The most damaging phrase in the language is.. it's always been done this way
